overview: A sudden pandemic turns the Hotel Malangel into a deadly labyrinth. To survive this night you have to hide, but behind the door of every room there's a surprise waiting... The arrival of some guys ready to face the Apocalypse brings a glimmer of hope... But their only mission is to get to Malangel's suite and rescue her before it's too late... A horror story with zombies, music and the fight against lgtbiphobia.
title: Hotel Malángel
